title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: The system does not properly validate date values in the report design.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the UI or the model.
SR: Implement proper validation for date values in the report design to ensure only valid date/time strings are accepted.
